Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Waseem Abbas "Was"
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this phone so far. It is a great buy for the money. Battery lasts longer. Signal reception is quite good. Software can be improved and more applications can be added. However, for basic phone operations it is quite good.

Reviews.Title: BEATS SAMSUNG PRODUCTS
Reviews.Author: BOB ARCHER
Reviews.Content: BLU-D HAS BETTER RECEPTION THAN THE 4 SAMSUNG AND 2 LG PHONE MODELS I HAVE IN THIS POOR CELLPHONE SIGNAL AREA.  BLU WORKS EVEN WITHOUT THE WILSON BOOST.  THE CHARGE LASTS TWICE AS LONG, I GUESS IT DOES NOT HAVE TO WASTE BATTERY LOOKING FOR A SIGNAL

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly featureful
Reviews.Author: Aldenone
Reviews.Content: This is an inexpensive cell phone with smartphone like features including expandable MicroSD memory and dual simm.  It does seem a little touchy about which MicroSD is used though and that is a inconveniencing, but all in all a good phone.

ProductInfo.Name: BLU Diva X T372T Unlocked GSM Phone with Dual SIM, 1.3MP Camera + LED Flash, Blu
